name: Eternal Death
description:
Play it on Newgrounds for earn point from medals.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Eternal Death is a turn-based rogue-like game.
Your objective is to reach the Gem, a mineral that holds a source of immense power.
Dungeons are full of obstacles: face or bypass enemies to continue and find helpful items to improve your statistics.
Watch out for the dangers of environment!

This game was a pretext to learn JavaScript.
